main event: Three Air Force non-commissioned officers observed a disc-shaped object spraying blue-green flames while making five passes over Hamilton Air Force Base in California.
interesting points: The object was reported to have a speed of 1000 to 1500 miles per hour., The observers described the object as circular, flat in the center, and tapering at the sides., They used binoculars to track the object's movement., The sky was clear over Hamilton Field despite high fog elsewhere in the San Francisco Bay area., Air Force Intelligence questioned the witnesses extensively after the sighting.
witness description: Corporal Lucian Pyron, Staff Sergeant Ellis Lorimer, Staff Sergeant Vinci Spearo
